p: Phylogenetic analyses on JP/SM87/87 showed that this strain belongs to VId ND viruses (FigureÂ 5). VId viruses together with VIb and VIc were responsible for the third panzootic, which were reported to be spread by pigeons. This strain shared 100% sequence identity with JP/Tochigi/85 and JP/Ibaraki/85, which may indicate that JP/SM87/87 was a product of the ongoing outbreak.
